players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Diana: "Bob was acting suspiciously last night. I think he might have been the mafioso."
Charlie: "I am the mafioso, and I killed Bob last night. Diana's suspicion is misplaced."
You: "I think Diana is telling the truth and Bob was indeed acting suspiciously. I also believe Charlie's confession is a lie, as it doesn't make sense for him to reveal himself so openly."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
